Mod0_Description: {c_important}Forceful Arrow{/c} Knocks Back Non-Elite enemies if they are Close. If they collide with another enemy, both are Knocked Down for {c_number}{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Mod1_Description: Every {c_number}3rd{/c} cast of {c_important}Forceful Arrow{/c} additionally has a {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
name: Forceful Arrow
